markdownRemark.html:
Regex can be used for Pattern Recognition.

Typical Uses for Regex: Input Validation Search and (replace)

Regex is supported in almost all major programming languages (Java, JS, C, C++, C#, Python, Perl etc)

/#[ABCDEF01234567890]/ // => limiters, start and end [ABCDEF01234567890] - allowed characters ? => Match 0 or 1 time

  • => Match 0 or more times
  • => Match 1 or more times

/#?[ABCDEF01234567890]+/ /#?[A-F0-9]{6}|[A-F0-9]{6}/ /#?([A-F0-9]{6}|[A-F0-9]{3})/ /#?([A-Fa-f0-9]{6}|[A-Fa-f0-9]{3})/ /#?([A-F0-9]{6}|[A-F0-9]{3})/i /^#?([A-F0-9]{6}|[A-F0-9]{3})$/i
